Description:
Allows the user to delete a status they own. 
Returns the same data as update's initial creation. Essentially you get back what you put in on delete. Probably makes un-delete application level functionality easy.
When trying to delete another user's post it sends back:
  "errors": [
    {
      "code": 183,
      "message": "You may not delete another user's status."
    }
Retweets the tweet whose id you supply.  Returns the original tweet with all the details (original poster, etc.) of the original tweet.
Gives you back a detailed list of all the people that the given user_id is following.
